trans-unit.source: Specifies how new animations interact with any existing ones that are already applied to a property.
trans-unit.target: Specifica come nuove animazioni interagiscono con quelle esistenti già applicate a una proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using Compose, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system will not remove the clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Quando si applica un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>a una proprietà tramite composizione, qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>gli oggetti precedentemente associati a tale proprietà continueranno a utilizzare le risorse di sistema, il sistema di temporizzazione non rimuoverà gli orologi automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using Compose, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare problemi di prestazioni quando si applica un numero elevato di clock utilizzando composizione, è necessario rimuovere clock di composizione dalla proprietà animata dopo il completamento.

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: Esistono diversi modi per rimuovere un orologio:: per rimuovere tutti gli orologi da una proprietà, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metodo dell'oggetto animato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Specificare la proprietà viene aggiunta un'animazione come primo parametro, e `null` come il secondo.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione rimuoverà tutti gli orologi di animazione della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Per rimuovere un specifico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>da un elenco di clock, utilizzare la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>proprietà di una di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>recuperare un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>quindi chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metodo di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Ciò avviene in genere il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>gestore eventi per un orologio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che solo i clock radice possono essere controllati da un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>restituisce proprietà di un orologio figlio `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event will not be raised if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Si noti inoltre che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento non verrà generato se la durata effettiva dell'orologio è infinita.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, l'utente deve determinare quando chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta principalmente di un problema per le animazioni su oggetti che hanno una lunga durata.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks will also be disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando un oggetto viene sottoposto a garbage collection, anche i clock verranno disconnessi e raccolti nel Garbage Collector.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli oggetti clock, vedere [animazione e temporizzazione System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: New animations are combined with existing animations by appending the new animations to the end of the composition chain.
trans-unit.target: Le nuove animazioni vengono combinate con quelle esistenti aggiungendo le nuove animazioni alla fine della catena di composizione.

trans-unit.source: New animations replace any existing animations on the properties to which they are applied.
trans-unit.target: Le nuove animazioni sostituiscono eventuali animazioni esistenti nelle proprietà a cui sono applicati.
